06854.mean:
the twenty-second consonant of the SIrijunga alphabet.

सिरिजङ्गा वर्णमालाको बाइसौं व्यन्जनवर्ण ।

06855.mean:
A thin and strong thread; a thread-like string to entrap the parent birds in their nest.

खिरिलो डोरी; माउ चरीलाई गुँडमा पासो थाप्ने सानो तर खिरिलो डारी ।

06856.mean:
1. protecting oneself from rains. 2. to go under the shade/shelter to protect oneself from rains. 3. to go and stay/hide in a place to shelter oneself from rains; to go and stay in the shade to protect oneself from rains.

१. वर्षाबाट बच्न ओत लाग्ने काम । २. (वर्षाबाट बच्न रूख आदिमा) ओत लाग्नु । ३. ओतमा (पानीबाट बच्नका लागी) जानु ।

06861.mean:
a kind of air potato; potato yam. Dioscorea bulbifera.

गिट्ठा ।

06863.mean:
low-lying shaded land; damp/wet/swampy/marsh-mallowy land.

गैरी जग्गा; सेपिलो जमिन; चिस्यान जग्गा ।

06868.mean:
a kind of bird found in a wet or marshy land; marsh bird; water bird/fowl.

सिमसारमा पाइने सिम चरो ।

06869.mean:
bottle-guard from which small vessels are made for holding water, liquor etc. Lagenaria siceraia standle.

लौका ।

06872.mean:
Rajanigandha; a kind of flower that blooms at night. Polyanthus sp.

राती फुल्ने एक प्रकारको सेतो फुल; रजनीगन्धा ।

06874.mean:
south-east corner/direction.

आग्नेय कोण (दिशा); पूर्व र दक्षिण दिशाको बीचको कोण ।

06877.mean:
a kind of small bird (like quail, sparrow etc).

बगेरो; बगेडी चरो ।

06880.mean:
the Siwalik hill range situated sout of the Mahabharat range and north of the Terai.

चुरे वा सिवालिक पहाड शृङ्खला; महाभारतको दक्षिण र मधेसको उत्तरमा अवस्थित पहाडी शृङ्खला ।

06881.mean:
in a restless/impatient/unsteady/agile manner.

छुकछुक, चकचक गरिरहने किसिमले ।

06882.mean:
(movement of worms, ants etc) in a teeming/swarnimg way.

सिलिङ्मिलिङ्/स्याँउस्याँउ गर्ने चालाले ।

06883.mean:
growing healthily (kids etc).

कलकलाउदो; बढ्दो; कलिलो (केटाकेटी वा पाठापाठी) ।

06884.mean:
1. a kind of white-flowered rhododendron; its tree. Rhododendron sp. 2. a kind of wild leafy-flower used during the wordhip of Himsammang.

१. चिमाली, चिमालो वा चिमल फूल; त्यस फूलको बोट । २. हिम्साम्माङ् गर्दा प्रयोग गरिने जङ्गली पातेफूल ।

06885.mean:
gazing/staring without winking one’s eyes.

आँखा चिम्म वा झिमिक्क नभएको; ट्वाल्ल परेको ।

06886.mean:
fold; layer; sheet.

सरो; पत्र; तह; खात; खाप ।

06887.mean:
1. glossy. 2. naked. 3. clean; smooth.

१. टल्कने किसिमको चिप्लो वा चिल्लो । २. नाङ्गो । ३. सफा, स्निग्ध ।

06889.mean:
a kind of soft ground mushroom of turmeric color.

भुइँमा उम्रने, बेसारजस्तो कमलो च्याउ; बेसारे च्याउ ।

06890.mean:
feather hat, crested turban/crown/headgear of a Yeba or a Limbu Shaman.

बिजुवाको कल्कीवाल पगरी ।

06891.mean:
a kind of medicinal weed.

औषधिको रूपमा प्रयोग गरिने एक प्रकारको झार ।

06893.mean:
1. a man with big lips. 2. labial.

१. ओंठे । २. ओष्ठ्य ।

06895.mean:
1. vessel made of bottle gourd to hold liquor or water. 2. vessel made of bottle gourd to hold liquor or water carried by the Phedangmas, Yebas and Sambas during worship or rituals. 3. a water vessel (pot).

१. पानी वा रक्सी हाल्ने लौकाको चिन्डो । २. फेदाङ्मा, येबा र साम्बाहरूले पूजा गर्दा रक्सी वा पानी बोक्ने लौकाको चिन्डो । ३. कमण्डलु ।

06896.mean:
1. bottle guard. Lagenaria siceraria. 2. vessel of bottle gourd carried by the Phedangmas, Yebas and Sambas.

१. लौका । २. फेदाङ्मा, येबा र साम्बाहरूले बोक्ने लौकाको चिन्डो ।
